Uses of Class
gwt.g2d.client.graphics.Gradient

Packages that use Gradient
gwt.g2d.client.graphics Contains the framework for manipulating canvas using 2D context. 
 

Uses of Gradient in gwt.g2d.client.graphics
 

Subclasses of Gradient in gwt.g2d.client.graphics
 class LinearGradient
          Represents a linear gradient that paints along the line given by the coordinates.
 class RadialGradient
          Represents a radial gradient that paints along the cone given by the circles.
 

Methods in gwt.g2d.client.graphics that return Gradient
 Gradient Gradient.addColorStop(ColorStop colorStop)
          Adds a color stop.
 Gradient Gradient.addColorStop(double offset, Color color)
          Adds a color at the given offset point.
 Gradient Gradient.addColorStops(java.util.Collection<ColorStop> colorStops)
          Adds a collection of color stops.
 Gradient Gradient.addColorStops(ColorStop... colorStops)
          Adds an array of color stops.
 

Methods in gwt.g2d.client.graphics with parameters of type Gradient
 Surface Surface.fillBackground(Gradient gradient)
          Fills the background with the given gradient.
 Surface Surface.setFillStyle(Gradient gradient)
          Sets the fill style.
 Surface Surface.setStrokeStyle(Gradient gradient)
          Sets the stroke style.
